item.title: Report E-2025020179
item.description:
Report E-2025020179

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-11
  • City: HOGANSVILLE
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: LOVE'S TRAVEL STOPS & COUNTRY STORES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 35-gallons of diesel fuel released due to an overfill from a delivery tanker. The release impacted a 100â€™ x 25' area on asphalt and concrete. No soil or drains were impacted. Hepaco cleaned ad recovered the released diesel fuel with absorbents. The impacted absorbents were containerized into two, 55-gallon metal drums and transported offsite for proper disposal.
